post.body: very cool! I'm not very musically inclined, but I can appreciated music.
very cool, do you play any instruments
fill me in on your philosophy? :)
since May, sorry I never got back to you...I need to be better about my tweeting!!
no problem! and I am confident you will love them!
I love the doghouse commercial! :)
thanks for the get well message--my teeth are doing nicely!
I saw @repcor at dinner and she told me more too...I think I need to sign up asap!
well I checked it out a little more in depth--so it's just a social networking site for travellers? sounds awesome
tripwolf looks really cool! I'd love to learn more! :)
sorry i missed your note earlier--but honestly how gross is meat yogurt? maybe in a gyro it'd be good. :)
I'll be there on Thursday!!
what a yummy lunch together!
it's a blogspot
mmmm I want a Sephora gift certificate! :)
I love Long Beach!! How bout you? Maybe DM me so I see it sooner :)
has anyone heard Boyce Avenue? check them out on youtube, just happened across their stuff and they are awesomee!
Wish I was at the Boston Tweetup--instead had 3 wisdom teeth pulled..yikes
Dinner with @YPICboston was great tonight! So happy that @repcor was there!! :)
Global Giving seems like a really cool idea, helps to raise funds for some very great initiatives! I like it!
I volunteer with a foundation participating in Global Giving--check out our site--http://www.globalgiving.com/pr/2400/proj2382a.html
Writing a brochure promoting meat yogurt--it's not real..thank goodness!
